Text.val: 24.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
28.06.2012 GB SCR17407 Changed name of file
... prepare path/filename for TXT output file
... convert file to BU encoding (error handling is implemented in GB324)
.. in case of directory does not exists --> MSGW
-- Create directories if does not exist
... if create of new directorry failed --> MSGW

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct CLBD310_IBAN, CLBD310_ADMNO, CLBD310_CLNTNO from :1/CLBD join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = CLBD310_ADMNO and ADMN_CREATE_DLMF = 'Y' join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = CLBD310_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLBD310_CLNTNO and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <>2 where CLBD310_IBAN <> '' order by CLBD310_ADMNO, CLBD310_CLNTNO, CLBD310_IBAN for fetch only
